naslov: Mastrinka, APARTMANSKA KUĆA / panoram. pogled more / VIDEO -čitaj opis (prodaja)
opis: Ova atraktivna nekretnina u Mastrinki, malom dalmatinskom mjestu na otoku Čiovo, predstavlja izvanrednu priliku za investitore ili one koji traže dom s prekrasnim pogledom na Jadransko more. Smještena samo 140 metara od idilične šljunčane plaže, kuća se uzdiže na uzvisini, pružajući neometan pogled s prostranih balkona koji okružuju svaki kat. Parcela od 457m2 uključuje glavnu stambenu jedinicu od 489.64m2 i dodatni pomoćni objekt od 48.64m2, nudeći obilje prostora i mogućnosti. Dok je kuća već opremljena svim potrebnim dozvolama, izuzev uporabne dozvole, novi vlasnik će imati priliku dovršiti posljednja dva kata po vlastitim željama i potrebama, nakon čega može zatražiti i spomenutu dozvolu. Prizemlje (72.34m2) kuće nudi funkcionalan prostor s garažom, konobom i kupatilom, koji je nedavno transformiran u jednosobni i studio apartman, idealan za iznajmljivanje ili kao gostinjski smještaj. Prvi kat (142.19m2) kuće sadrži prostrani četverosobni stan, moderniziran 2018. godine, dok su drugi kat (143.78m2) i visoko potkrovlje (131.33m2) u fazi ROH BAU, spremni za personalizaciju i dovršetak. Osim impresivnog stambenog prostora, kuća nudi i pet vanjskih parking mjesta te potencijal za postavljanje bazena, što bi dodatno povećalo njezinu vrijednost i privlačnost za turistički najam. S obzirom na lokaciju, kvalitetu gradnje i mogućnosti koje pruža, ova nekretnina je idealna za one koji žele ulagati u turizam ili kombinirati poslovni poduhvat s osobnim životnim prostorom u jednom od najljepših dijelova Hrvatske. - prodaja agencije #adriaINgroup - kupac plaća agencijsku proviziju 3% od prodajne cijene Cijenjeni klijenti, razgled nekretnine moguć je isključivo uz potpisani posrednički ugovor koji je temelj za daljnje radnje vezane za kupoprodaju, a sve sukladno Zakonu o posredovanju u prometu nekretnina. - NAPOMENA: detaljne slike, video, te lokaciju, šaljemo isključivo uz potpisani posrednički ugovor eng -------------------------------------------------------- This attractive property in Mastrinka, a small Dalmatian town on the island of Čiovo, represents an extraordinary opportunity for investors or those looking for a home with a beautiful view of the Adriatic Sea. Located only 140 meters from the idyllic pebble beach, the house rises on a hill, offering unobstructed views from the spacious balconies surrounding each floor. The plot of 457m2 includes the main residential unit of 489.64m2 and an additional outbuilding of 48.64m2, offering plenty of space and possibilities. While the house is already equipped with all the necessary permits, except for the use permit, the new owner will have the opportunity to complete the last two floors according to his own wishes and needs, after which he can also request the aforementioned permit. The ground floor (72.34m2) of the house offers a functional space with a garage, a tavern and a bathroom, which was recently transformed into a one-room and studio apartment, ideal for renting or as guest accommodation. The first floor (142.19m2) of the house contains a spacious four-room apartment, modernized in 2018, while the second floor (143.78m2) and high attic (131.33m2) are in the ROH BAU phase, ready for personalization and completion. In addition to the impressive living space, the house also offers five outdoor parking spaces and the potential to install a swimming pool, which would further increase its value and attractiveness for tourist rental. Considering the location, the quality of construction and the possibilities it offers, this property is ideal for those who want to invest in tourism or combine a business venture with a personal living space in one of the most beautiful parts of Croatia. - sale of #adriaINgroup agency - the buyer pays an agency commission of 3% of the sales price Dear clients, viewing the property is only possible with a signed brokerage contract, which is the basis for further actions related to the sale, and all in accordance with the Act on Brokerage in Real Estate Transactions. - NOTE: we send detailed pictures, video, and location only with a signed mediation contract #adriaINgroup real estate-consulting-design-development-VIP service ...............................................................
